overview_metadata.overview_description: In this lesson, students solve systems of equations composed of a linear equation and a quadratic equation using substitution, factoring, and the Quadratic Formula. They verify the algebraic solutions graphically by determining the coordinates of the points of intersection. Students determine the possible number of solutions for these types of systems.

overview_item_data_items: I can solve graphically a system consisting of a linear and a quadratic equation.
I can algebraically solve a system consisting of a linear and a quadratic equation.
I can describe the number of solutions for a system consisting of a linear and a quadratic equation.
You can use algebraic and graphical methods to solve a system of equations involving a linear and a quadratic equation.
A system of equations consisting of a linear and a quadratic equation may have no solution, one solution, or two solutions.
The number of solutions for a system of equations coincides with the number of intersection points of its two graphs.
You can use a system of equations involving a linear equation and a quadratic equation to model some real-world situations.

overview_item_data_group_items.overview_item_data_group_item_descriptio: Students determine the information needed to answer a real-world question.

overview_item_data_group_items.overview_item_data_group_item_title: Modeling a System with a Linear and Quadratic Equation
overview_item_data_group_items.overview_item_data_group_item_descriptio: Students use graphs to investigate a situation and identify the number of solutions.

overview_item_data_group_items.overview_item_data_group_item_title: Solving a System with a Linear and a Quadratic Equation
overview_item_data_group_items.overview_item_data_group_item_descriptio: Students solve systems with one linear and one quadratic equation algebraically and graphically.

overview_item_data_group_items.overview_item_data_group_item_title: Solving Systems with Quadratics in Real-World Situations
overview_item_data_group_items.overview_item_data_group_item_descriptio: Students solve real-world problems involving systems with quadratics graphically and algebraically.
Students identify the number of possible solutions for combinations of linear and quadratic equations.

overview_item_data_items: If facilitating this lesson without student devices, no additional materials are needed.
To avoid printing additional materials not included in MATHbook (like Activate activities and Session Quick Checks) project them using the Present button above.
